text: is an album that is by Radwimps. They are a Japanese rock band. The album is their eighth album and is the soundtrack of Your Name. It was released on 24 August 2016 by Universal Music Japan. The album was certified for gold by the Recording Industry Association of Japan because it sold over 100 000 copies. == Track listing == ==Related pages== *Your Name, the movie that this album was made for. ==References== Category:2016 albums Category:Rock albums
title: Your Name (album)
